mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.user_id, l.source_type, l.source_name, l.amount, l.type, c.label AS category, l.date, l.merchant_name FROM ledger l JOIN tr_category c ON l.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN account a ON l.account_id = a.id LEFT JOIN card cd ON l.card_id = cd.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND (l.account_id IS NULL OR a.is_active = TRUE) AND (l.card_id IS NULL OR cd.is_active = TRUE) AND l.date >= #{from} AND l.date <= #{to} AND c.name = #{category} ORDER BY l.date DESC

SELECT l.id, l.user_id, l.source_type, l.source_name, l.amount, l.type, l.memo, l.analysis, l.date, l.merchant_name, l.place, l.account_id, l.card_id, l.source_id, l.created_at, c.name AS category FROM ledger l JOIN tr_category c ON l.category_id = c.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.id = #{ledgerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ledger ( user_id, source_type, source_name, amount, type, category_id, memo, analysis, date, merchant_name, place, account_id, card_id, source_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceName}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, #{memo}, #{analysis}, #{date}, #{merchantName}, #{place}, #{accountId}, #{cardId}, #{sourceId}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AVG(sub.month_total), 0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(l.amount) AS month_total FROM ledger l JOIN tr_category c ON l.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN account a ON l.account_id = a.id LEFT JOIN card cd ON l.card_id = cd.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND c.name = #{category} AND (l.account_id IS NULL OR a.is_active = TRUE) AND (l.card_id IS NULL OR cd.is_active = TRUE) AND l.date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{monthCount} MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND l.date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(l.date, '%Y-%m') ) AS sub

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ledger l JOIN tr_category c ON l.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN account a ON l.account_id = a.id LEFT JOIN card cd ON l.card_id = cd.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND c.name = #{category} AND (l.account_id IS NULL OR a.is_active = TRUE) AND (l.card_id IS NULL OR cd.is_active = TRUE) AND l.date < #{before} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.name FROM ledger l JOIN tr_category c ON l.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN account a ON l.account_id = a.id LEFT JOIN card cd ON l.card_id = cd.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND (l.account_id IS NULL OR a.is_active = TRUE) AND (l.card_id IS NULL OR cd.is_active = TRUE) AND l.date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{monthCount} MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY SUM(l.amount) DESC LIMIT 3
